Html:
When exporting document to Excel5 format  group/outline buttons are not displayed. Need to turn on this option (DisplayOutline) in document properties
In version 1.6.5 the buttons was displayed correctly.

You're right, after some clean-up in Excel5 writer the group/outline buttons stopped displaying.
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=9437

If you download the latest source code, everything should be ok again:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx
